text: If you're connected to a server
and see someone you want to add,

right-click their name
and then select "Profile."

On their profile, click
"Send Friend Request."
If the person you want to add as a friend

they can send you their
Discord username and tag.

go to the friends tab and
then click "Add Friend."

Paste the username and
tag into the search bar

and then send your request
to the profile that appears.
